Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WOMEN'S ISSUES

Title: Replaces all instances of the words or variations of the words feminine hygiene products and sanitary napkins with the words menstrual products or pads, respectively, or a variation thereof
Summary: Replaces all instances of the words or variations of the words feminine hygiene products and sanitary napkins with the words menstrual products or pads, respectively, or a variation thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง625, Cor L; amd ยง267, Pub Health L; amd ยง1115, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the public health law and the tax law, in relation to replacing all instances of the words or variations of the words feminine hygiene products and sanitary napkins with the words menstrual products and pads, respectively, or a variation thereof
